name: Spirit Level (gracerabbittegames)
description:
The house you're tasked with fixing is haunted! 

Get rid of the ghouls and monsters before they reach you! 

Instructions:

To Move: Left and Right Arrow Key

To Shoot: Ctrl

A Space Invaders inspired game.

1 Level Game

*Music: https://www.bensound.com

Art Work by Grace Rabbitte
